longBusinessSummary: Ebara Corporation manufactures and sells pumps, compressors, turbines, and chillers in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, Japan, Oceania, North America, and Central and South America. It operates through the Building Service & Industrial, Energy, Infrastructure, Environmental Solutions, and Precision Machinery segments. The company offers standard and custom pumps, fans, booster pump units, chillers, cooling towers, and heating and cooling machines; and cryogenic products. It also provides incineration systems, gasification technologies, municipal and industrial waste treatment plants, municipal waste processing plants, and boilers, as well as sewerage and drainage treatment systems. In addition, the company offers chemical mechanical polishing systems, CMP equipment, dry vacuum pumps, gas abatement systems, plating equipment, exhaust-gas treatment equipment, and ozonized water generators. Ebara Corporation was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
